text: prior to a basketball match at uw the location is excellent but it tends to get packed very fast you can find a diverse range of beer options at the pub although the food may not be topnotch and instead falls into the category of typical pub fare

its advisable to avoid the overpriced and bland taco salad which should ideally be priced at 199 instead of an exorbitant 699
with its topnotch cuisine extensive menu choices and highly knowledgeable employees this establishment is definitely worth revisiting

the quality of the food was outstanding with an extensive menu offering various excellent choices the staff members were highly knowledgeable and provided exceptional service without a doubt i would gladly return for another visit

i have visited this place multiple times and during one of my visits i encountered an extremely impolite female staff member if they are unable to provide excellent customer service its possible that they will remain as a barista indefinitely i suppose i wont be returning there in the future

i placed an order for two different dishes but strangely enough both of them turned out to be exactly the same it was difficult for me to determine which dish was which because they both had a taste similar to sweet and sour sauce even though i hadnt ordered that not only that but there also was no fried rice included which is commonly provided by panda express frankly speaking panda express is far better than this and that should tell you something

the pizza and service provided at this establishment have greatly impressed me due to their outstanding quality and undeniably their delivery service has continuously maintained a high standard of satisfaction for me
even though i havent eaten anything in a while lo and behold my drinks are now here after just 15 minutes i trust that the delay in service will be compensated by the deliciousness of the food

the team at this establishment is known for their extraordinary friendliness and we are filled with anticipation to witness the incredible assortment of parrots and various bird species they have in stock even though the location is relatively distant from my place in the southwest it presents a pleasant opportunity to engage in birdwatching whilst indulging in some plant shopping
best bbq ever  go here and thank me later

its utterly disheartening how dreadfully substandard their products are i recall spending a substantial amount of 50 on a lamp purchase only to witness the switch giving out within a meager period of 5 months shockingly they have a rigid return policy that denies any refunds beyond the initial 90day window leaving disgruntled patrons with no other option than receiving store credit upon personally going to the store location
definitely get the watermelon margarita

a trio of individuals made their way to the destination at 430 pm and settled into their seats it was rather surprising to see the place packed even during the early evening hours the service they experienced was topnotch leaving no room for complaints my personal order consisted of shrimp tacos which turned out to be quite pleasing to the palate the refried beans on the other hand carried a unique taste of ham bone flavor that added depth to every bite as a result i am more than willing to revisit the place in the near future
it could be advisable to avoid the excessively expensive and tasteless taco salad that appears unappealing and disappointing as it ought to be valued at 199 instead of 699

the hiltons older establishment is criticized for its outofdate and filthy rooms poorly maintained outdoor areas staff lacking knowledge and manners and a water park that tends to attract troublesome individuals this results in police intervention required nightly to handle intoxicated guests it would be wise to seek other options in your search
despite the 20minute wait for seating we thoroughly enjoyed our experience at this charming place due to the scrumptious food and the exceptionally friendly staff
slow service bartender got in an argument  with a guest about warm beer glasses margarita was watery and took forever to come out guacamole tasted like it had mayo in it bring back chinita

russells incredible customer service ensures youll be a repeat customer moving from hawaii to las vegas was made better by the knowledge of having a fantastic korean bbq spot to go to the taste is absolutely amazing and on top of that russell went above and beyond by serving us free drinks and peanuts personally i cant resist ordering their delicious meat jun

their products have poor quality i bought a lamp for 50 and the switch stopped working after only 5 months when contacted they claim that returns are not accepted beyond 90 days but if you go to the store they provide store credit as an alternative option

i had an incredibly enjoyable dining experience thanks to the remarkable food selection available on the menu and the wellinformed staff who went above and beyond to assist me i absolutely look forward to revisiting this place in the future

the excellent reviews had me incredibly excited to try their takeout service being a fan of vegetables i made sure to order only vegetarian dishes unfortunately the overall experience was underwhelming nevertheless my exploration for that perfect chinese restaurant in the southeastern valley persists

initially i was elated about giving the new pretzel burger a go on a saturday evening however my excitement swiftly morphed into disappointment when i discovered that my bun had been burnt and i strongly believed that the price of the meal was ridiculously high

the employees are exceptionally amiable and we are looking forward to discovering the diverse range of parrots and birds they have available despite its considerable distance from my southwest area it provides a delightful opportunity for birdwatching while browsing plants
the quality of the pizza and service here is impressive and my satisfaction with their delivery service has been consistently high
the bi bam bap comes highly recommended by numerous individuals for its exceptional customer service making it an excellent option
despite my intense hunger and anticipation to taste the new pretzel burger on saturday evening i was left disappointed due to the burnt bun and the burger being excessively expensive

at soupersalad you can enjoy a hearty meal of soup and salad for nearly 10 along with the choice of including a beverage the quality and selection of food make it a place worth returning to occasionally as its nearby and reasonably priced particularly suitable for kids who prefer water as their drink of choice nevertheless i hold the opinion that making patrons pay separately for a soda is somewhat unjustified
the food was excellent the menu had great options and the staff was very wellinformed i would definitely visit again
how is it possible to have a bar that experiences varying crowd sizes but still struggles to fulfill its financial responsibilities leaving me with the burden of finding a solution
the anticipation of sampling the new pretzel burger on a saturday evening swiftly transformed into disillusionment as i realized my bun was scorched and the overall cost of the meal seemed exorbitant
delighting in a luxurious and heavenly spread of breakfast and lunch dishes
with its outstanding selection of dishes extensive variety in the menu and a team of highly informed employees this place is definitely worth coming back to
indulging in a heavenly brunch

statement 3 the establishment offers a delightful and exciting atmosphere although it may not be the most kidfriendly option when compared to other nearby venues the waitstaff is physically attractive though their level of friendliness does not exceed what one might expect it is particularly wellsuited for individuals in their twenties looking for a vibrant place to enjoy happy hour and indulging in latenight festivities however the quality of the food is just satisfactory

the staff members are incredibly warm and welcoming and we cant wait to explore the wide array of parrots and other avian species on offer although its quite far from where i reside in the southwest it promises an enjoyable afternoon of observing birds alongside shopping for plants
